title: Firefox 0.9.1
body: In case you haven't heard it already, <a href="http://www.mozilla.org/products/firefox/">Firefox 0.9.1 is out</a>.  It installed perfectly fine over top of my <a href="http://travis.servebeer.com/blog.net/archive/2004/06/15/real_browser_mozilla_firefox_zero_point_nine_released_torrent.aspx">0.9 install</a> (no uninstall BS required).
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-06-29

Firefox 0.9.1

In case you haven't heard it already,

bodyNavItems.text: It's the summer of Express on Channel 9
